articles.author: Tanika Godbole, Kate Hairsine
articles.title: US updates: Trump announces full travel ban for 12 countries - dw.com
articles.description: The White House has announced a new travel ban for citizens of 12 countries — largely from Africa and the Middle East. The new rules are set to come into effect at the beginning of next week. DW has more.
articles.content:
In addition to the new travel ban on 12 countries, US President Donald Trump has also moved to block nearly all international students who want to attend Harvard from entering the country.
